games.title: Move Emoji
games.description:
Move Emoji Match Puzzle

Welcome to Move Emoji Puzzle! In this game, your task is to match emojis by moving them around. You have to think carefully because you only get a certain number of moves to solve each puzzle. 

Be smart about using your moves! If you use up all your moves and haven't cleared the puzzle, you'll lose the level. The goal is to match all the emoji boxes to clear the level and move on to the next fun challenge!
games.howToPlayText:
- Just swipe to move an emoji box. It's that easy! 
- Match emojis to clear them from the board.
- Remember, you have limited moves to complete your task.

Move Emoji Puzzle is perfect if you love puzzles and emojis. It's a fun way to test your brain and have a great time! 
Play now and start the emoji-matching fun! Let's see if you can beat all the levels!

games.title: Fun Sorting Through The Shelves
games.description:
Welcome to the cozy world of logic and order!

In this relaxing and addictive puzzle game, you have to search for identical objects and carefully place them on the shelves. Arrange things so that three identical items are next to each other ‚Äî they will combine into a triplet and make room for new finds.

Collect objects three at a time, decorating your virtual corner and turning it into an ideal space for relaxing the soul. Cleaning has never been so much fun!

This light and peaceful game is suitable for everyone ‚Äî regardless of age, gender and experience. If you love order, beautiful collections and a pleasant atmosphere ‚Äî this game is just for you!
games.howToPlayText:
Just drag and drop the items and place them neatly on the shelves. Collect three identical objects on the same shelf to create a triplet and make room for new items.

Complete the levels, clearing all the shelves and revealing your strategic wit. With each new stage, the difficulty increases, and with it the pleasure of solving problems!

Unlock dozens of unique items. The more levels you complete, the more cool rewards you'll get!

Simple, intuitive and incredibly addictive gameplay awaits you. Are you ready to start cleaning up?

games.title: Emoji Sort
games.description: Emoji Sort is a pattern recognition puzzle game where players must fill in empty cells with the correct emojis. Each puzzle presents a grid with missing emojis that follow specific patterns - such as categories, sequences, or associations. Players analyze the existing emojis to identify the pattern (animals, food chains, transportation types, etc.) and select the appropriate emojis to complete the grid. The game features 30 increasingly challenging levels with various pattern types, and includes a hint system to help when players get stuck. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts who enjoy discovering logical connections between visual elements!
games.howToPlayText:
Select the appropriate emoji by clicking or touching it.
Each puzzle may seem nonsensical, but there is only one correct answer!

games.title: Run The Electricity
games.description:
Run The Electricity is a unique puzzle game that combines simplicity and benefits for your mind. It is designed to give relaxation, help to cope with stress and improve concentration.

Instead of intense gameplay and a race against time, a calm process awaits you here: you just need to connect lines, lamps and energy sources in a closed circuit to turn on the light.

Minimalistic design, smooth animation and soothing music create an atmosphere of complete tranquility comparable to yoga. This is not just a game, but a means to meditate and combat anxiety. You can play it at home, on the road, or at work to distract yourself and restore your mental balance.

Smart puzzles train logic and imagination, and simple mechanics allow you to have fun from the first seconds. Discover a world of light, harmony and tranquility!
games.howToPlayText:
Playing this game is easy and enjoyable. All you need to do is tap on the lines and turn them until you get a closed electrical circuit.

For the light to come on, at least one lamp and a wire must be connected in it. As soon as this happens, the lines will shine, and you will get a feeling of completeness and tranquility.

Each puzzle takes only a few seconds, but it brings a lot of fun. This makes the game ideal for short pauses, trips, or waiting. You don't have to rush: the levels are unlimited in time, and you can solve them at your own pace.

With each new stage, the tasks become more interesting and diverse, training concentration and attention. Conduct Electricity will help to cope with anxiety, give positive emotions and become an excellent anti-stress remedy. Just open the game, start connecting the lines, and feel your mind calm down.

games.title: Match Master
games.description:
Get ready for a new, challenging and original matching pairs brain game.
You need to match 3D objects on the ground and pop them all! When you clear a level, you will find new objects to pair. Sort and find all pairs, clear the board and win!

Start searching for hidden object and matching tile pairs - Match 3D is a perfect way to zen relaxing and at the same time testing your memory and mind skills.
games.howToPlayText:
- Pick the 1st 3d object it can be (a shiny 3D object, animal, or an emoji)
- Then pick up the 2nd 3d object & move both of them to the circle in the middle of the screen.
- Keep doing that until you clear the whole screen & win the level.
- Then keep having fun & start a new level

games.title: Tile Match
games.description:
Welcome to Tile Match! Get ready for a fun and exciting game where you need to keep matching tiles before they reach the bottom. It's a perfect game for anyone who loves puzzles and quick thinking!

How It Works:
Tiles keep coming from the top and move down. Your job is to make sure none of the tiles touch the bottom border. If they do, oops, the level is over and you have to start again!
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play:
- Keep an eye on the tiles moving down.
- Match tiles to clear them before they reach the bottom.
- The faster you match, the higher your score goes!

games.title: Ocean Pop
games.description: Ocean Pop brings a delightful new twist to the blast genre, inviting players of all ages to dive into a lively underwater world brimming with charm and color. Unlike typical grid-based games like Toy Blast, Ocean Pop features real 2D bubbles that drift, bounce, and cluster with natural, playful physics, creating puzzles that feel dynamic and alive. Players dive beneath the waves to pop colorful bubbles, trigger satisfying chain reactions, and explore the serene beauty of the ocean depths ‚Äî all while enjoying intuitive gameplay that‚Äôs easy to pick up yet delightfully challenging to master.
games.howToPlayText: Use the mouse to pop matched colored bubbles to reach the target of the level Use powerups in the right moment to have the best results.

games.title: Onet Puzzle - Tile Match Game
games.description: Onet Puzzle is a tile-matching game to play and relax in the free time. It offers 20+ elaborate themes and music for much fun! With memory of your brain and concentration of your mind, you search pairs, connect to eliminate them during the given time. Higher level you get more challenging it is, but various tools and treasure box are there for help! Enjoy it now!
games.howToPlayText:
HOW TO PLAY
- Connect two same tiles to eliminate them with a polyline.
- The polyline contains no more than 3 inflection points.
- Get harder for higher level with more grids and types of pairs.
- 4 useful tools are there to help.
- More scores and higher level you get when you win.
- Higher enough to get treasure box.
- There is time limit.

But it's not just cleaning! Uncover the conspiracy of cunning Ratty who wants to destroy the forest. Complete story chapters: track garbage trucks, expose arsonists and save your home!
